entry.title: 2024-06-13 失业金 差点亏
entry.content:
记录脚本使用。

交易记录与视频

介绍

记录：
今天预估偏小，实际偏大。
最佳策略是采用75%的相对仓位，批量开单2 ~ 3次，不带止损止赢。
实际策略是采用50%的相对仓位，批量开单1次。相差4*5倍。

操作步骤

调整仓位：采用50%的仓位。对应脚本和log如下。

开始下单：选择带止赢的脚本，批量开单一次。

a. 有一单没成交上。出错记录如下：

关闭：主要用这几个脚本关闭交易。当前有未成交的订单需要关闭。

视频

操作视频：(手机查看，请点全屏播放)

交易视频：同上。

交易结果

交易结果：

结果分析：
a. 用错脚本，不该带止赢的。
b. 滑点厉害，导致3单没利润。开单价滑点，成交价也滑点。
c. 网络慢，有一单没成交上。应该是操作慢了，开单价低于成交价导致买单失败。
d. 幸好空单没扫到，否则要倒亏。

entry.title: Modify Position and Take Profit & Stop Loss
entry.content:
Modify positions and take profit and stop loss.

Modify positions and take profit and stop loss

Introduction

modify the modified parameters:
Positions:
Take Profit & Stop Loss:
Bulk billing range and interval:

Modify parameters

position description:
Compatible minimum step: When the account balance is small, the position uses the minimum value, the step size is reduced and evenly spread.
Small and light: Small accounts have heavier positions.

Run this script and the position size description will be displayed.
Scripts\_OrderTest\OptimizeAccountLot.mq5

position modification:

As shown in the figure above, modify MM=0.06. That is, the total position of each batch order is 6%.
Then recompile.

Take Profit and Stop Loss:
As shown in the figure above, modify
STOPLOSS=150; //The stop loss is 150 pips, and the measured is $1.5
TAKEPROFIT=150; //Take profit of 300 points

range and interval of bulk billing:
As shown in the figure above, modify
RANGE=200; //The step size range is 200 points, and the order is placed in batches in this price range.
RTOTAL=20; //The step size is 40 points, that is, 10 orders

modify the price offset of the first order:
As shown in the figure above, modify
LEVEL=40; //A difference of $0.4 from the current price opens a ticket.

Recompilation

steps:
a. Open the IDE and modify the script parameters
b. Right-click on the _Orderxx folder and right-click on compilation
c. Open the MT5 software, right-click on the script to refresh, and click the script to run if needed
entry.summary: Modify positions and take profit and stop loss.

entry.title: Introduces the scripts that are already available on the forum
entry.content:
Script learning.

Script Learning

Introduction

script classification:
Expert Advisors:
Index:
Script:

functional categories:
Operate:
Drawing Aids:
Analysis: Backtesting
EA：

Operation

OpenSellPosition_X: Learn the input parameters
Time: 2014.01.10

setselllimitorder：set limit
Date: 2014.01.20
setselllimitorder.mq5：

InvertPosition: Open a reverse position at the current price
Date: 2014.01.20
invertposition.mq5：

one-touch to cancel other: when a pending order is triggered, the script deletes all (!) The current symbol is left with the order and exits
Time: 2014.02.10
oncecancelotherscript.mq5：

a flat order around the current price: a script to create a flat buy and sell pending order
Date: 2014.06.11
announcementstrategy.mq5: The existing order will be closed, and the code may be outdated.

a pending short order: When you drag and drop this script into the chart, it will calculate the current price of the price and determine whether to place a Sell Stop or Sell Limit pending order.
Time: 2015.02.06
sellorder.mq5：

Modify SL TP: Modify SL TP.
Time: 2017.05.03
Modify_SL_TP.mq5：

OpenSellStopOrder: a script for setting a pending SellStop order.
Time: 2017.06.05
OpenSellStopOrder.mq5：
A set of operations.

CloseOrdersBySymbolByType: the script deletes all orders in the current symbol according to the type specified in the settings
Time: 2017.06.05
CloseOrdersBySymbolByType.mq5：

MAX_LOT: This script calculates the maximum number of lots to open a position using the entire free margin in the deposit.
Time: 2017.06.05
MAX_LOT.mq5：
Modify the function to tile the order.

AutoSLTP: an aid for setting Stop Loss and Take Profit for all open orders. Symbol settings, position types, Stop Loss and Take Profit are specified in external files.
Time: 2017.11.16
AutoSLTP.mq5：

one-click closing: not fast enough.
Time: 2019.05.25.
CloseAllBuy.mq5: close long positions of the current chart symbol.
CloseAllSell.mq5: close a short position of the current chart symbol.
CloseAllPairs.mq5: close long and short positions of all symbols.

Drawing aids

Widescreenshooter: This script automatically calculates the width of the image file and adjusts the minimum and maximum values of the chart to fit the boundaries of the screenshot

wideshooter.mq5：

Candle Statistics 2: This is a modified version of the Candle Statistics script. Count the number of bars in a series of bullish and bearish markets. Displayed as a chart. Save a screenshot of the resulting chart. The CGraphic class is used.
Time: 2018.01.29
Statistics of candles 2.mq5：

Analysis

Output Historical Data: The purpose of this script is to output historical data in a specified format and convert it for external program analysis

history_in_mathcad.mq5：

ytg_Percent_Lot: This script calculates the volume of orders using the specified percentage of capital risk

save and display the test chart object: backtest. The purpose of this script is to save the objects on the test chart and then display them on the new chart.

EA

Simple EA: The Simplest Robot for Buying and Selling!

entry.title: Download my script file
entry.content:
Download the script file.

Download the script file

Introduction

download the script file: must be compiled once.
Downloading scripts from the MT5 software’s code base will be compiled automatically. However, copying the script file from another location requires manual compilation.
After downloading, please open the IDE software and right-click to compile the “scripts” folder. If you don’t know the steps you can search the web, or ask me, thank you!

how to compile:
a. There are two “Start/Resume Compilation” buttons, click the one on the left. If you click on the one on the right, you may place an order directly.
b. In the left sidebar, select the current file name and right-click to compile.
c. On the left sidebar, select the Chinese folder, right-click to compile.
d. Switch the trading software, refresh and use the script.

note:
a. It can only be used for XAUUSD varieties normally, and the prices, take-profit and stop-loss of other varieties are inaccurate.

Update history and download link

version 08 2024/06/13:
a. Modify only the test script name.
[Download mt5_scripts_20240613.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240613.zip)

Version 07 2024/06/04:
a. Remove the leverage modification. Use the built-in API to obtain leverage.
[Download mt5_scripts_20240604.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240604.zip)

Version 06 2024/06/03:
a. Increase the leverage and position percentage parameters. Refer to the introduction of the _OrderTest.
b. The leverage must be set, otherwise the position will be too different. Use OptimizeAccountLot to preview the position size of the current funds until it is appropriate.
[Download mt5_scripts_20240603.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240603.zip)

Version 04 2024/05/25:
a. Adjust the position size. Refer to another article on modifying positions.
b. Compatible with bugs caused by different platforms and different price bits.
[Download mt5_scripts_20240525.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240525.zip)

Version 03 2024/05/20:
a. When modifying batch billing, you cannot switch the price range by clicking continuously.

[Download mt5_scripts_20240520.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240520.zip)

Version 02 2024/05/18:
a. When modifying batch billing, you cannot switch the price range by clicking continuously. (Actually not corrected)
b. Add anti-single scripts.
c. Batch ordering, two-way stop order, add no take-profit script. This one is more greedy.

[Download mt5_scripts_20240518.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240518.zip)

version 01 2024/05/16:

[ download mt5_scripts_20240516.zip➬] (https://seefs.github.io/zip/mt5_scripts_20240516.zip)

Installation path

installation path:

entry.title: Downloading and using scripts
entry.content:
Please refer to this for the operation of the script.

Download and use scripts

Introduction

download and use of the script: use a script, “one-click closing”, and give examples of how to use and modify it.
It is important to note that scripts compiled on different platforms are not universal. You can click on the folder in the IDE to recompile.

Download & Use

download: You need to register and log in first, and click Download

Alternatively, click Show and download it from your browser, instructions may be used on the forum

to register and log in:

save location:

how to use: Turn on the switch, then double-click the script

effect: about 1 second to close 2 orders, not as fast as the mobile phone

Edit the script

open the editing tools:

modify the code: After modifying, click Run to recompile

copy each other: different trading software, can be copied directly and then used
entry.summary: Please refer to this for the operation of the script.

entry.title: Closing script
entry.content:
MT5 computer software has its own one-click closing function, which is not necessarily fast with scripts. Because using scripts is a one-by-one closing of positions, sometimes it is slower.

Closing script

Introduction

first set of closing scripts: This is a set of scripts on the forum. Download it in the code base on 2019.05.25.
The function is the same as that of MT5 computer software, batch operation - all positions are closed.

second set of closing scripts: This is a sample script from the MT5 help documentation. The previous group cannot delete unfilled orders, which is not perfect.
The function is the same as MT5 computer software, batch operation - delete all orders.
In the IDE editing software, select the variable and press F1 to view the help document.

The first set of closing scripts

1. Close all long positions: close only orders of the same symbol in the current window.
Scripts\_OrderClose\CloseAllBuy.mq5

2. Close all short positions: close only orders of the same symbol in the current window.
Scripts\_OrderClose\CloseAllSell.mq5

3. Close all long and short positions: close only orders of the same symbol in the current window.
Note: The original script on the forum closes orders for all symbols. The script I provided was restricted.
Scripts\_OrderClose\CloseAllPairs.mq5

Operation video:(please click full screen to play on mobile phones)

The second set of closing scripts

4. Delete all orders: close stop + limit orders and buy + sell orders of the same symbol in the current window.
Scripts\_OrderClose\RemoveAllOrder.mq5

Function Description:

5. Delete stop + limit orders: close only stop + limit orders of the same symbol in the current window.
Scripts\_OrderClose\RemoveAllStopLimitOrder.mq5
entry.summary: MT5 computer software has its own one-click closing function, which is not necessarily fast with scripts. Because using scripts is a one-by-one closing of positions, sometimes it is slower.

entry.title: Closing and reversing a position script
entry.content:
Considering the abnormal situation, close the position and reverse the order.

Closing and reversing the order script

Introduction

active anti-order: The script is not very useful

passive anti-order:

passive interval reversal:

Take the initiative to reverse orders

1. Take the initiative to reverse the order: the profit should be in the middle of the consideration. Let’s admit more in the loss.
Application scenario: The long-short demarcation point, I don’t want to confirm the direct reversal.
Scenario 1: Bucking the trend and earning enough.
Scenario 2: A pullback, encountering a large period moving average support.
Scenario 3: Manually overwhelmed.
Function Description: Positions need to be calculated

Passive anti-single

2. Risk reversal:
Scenario 1: The market diverges from retail positions.
Scenario 2: Obviously lure long and short market.

3. Callback reversal: There are too few scenes, so don’t do the function first
Scenario 1: After the morning breakout, take profit 2 starts to pull back.
Scenario 2: After the right side falls, pullback 1 starts to continue to fall.
Scenario 3: After falling 2 in the morning, there is a signal to open a position, and the callback is reversed.
Scenario 4: After breaking through 3 in the morning, cancel the anti-order.

4. Shock anti-single: don’t do it yet
Scenario 1: Contour is not equal.
Scenario 2: Equal to low and not equal to high.

Passive interval reversal

5. Passive interval reversal: It is necessary to do it
Scripts\_OrderOpenInvert\PreClose_5_5_10.mq5
Scripts\_OrderOpenInvert\PreClose_5_5_15.mq5
Scripts\_OrderOpenInvert\PreClose_5_10_15.mq5

Application scenario: Reverse the take profit at the current price of 0.5, and open a stop at an interval of 0.5.
entry.summary: Considering the abnormal situation, close the position and reverse the order.

entry.title: A single open script
entry.content:
A single opening script is basically not used, so there is no operation video.

Single open script

Introduction

MT5 to open a position with one click: this is a script on the forum. Download it in the code base on 2019.05.25.

second set of scripts for opening positions: this is a script on the forum. Download in the code base on 2017.06.05.

MT5 one-click position opening

1. Single Buy or Sell: Reference script. Download it in the code base on 2021.06.30

Scripts\_OrderOpenDemo\OpenSell.mq5

The second set of scripts for opening positions

3. Stop to open a position

entry.title: One-way batch opening script
entry.content:
I do a relatively small homeopathic list, and I will add it when I have experience.

One-way batch opening script

Introduction

Limit to open a position:

Stop:

StopLimit to open a position:

cons:
The overall feeling is that it is not useful to do short-term.
If you take a short position and open a position from the current price grid, there should be a lack of a script to set parameters to lock in profits. Let’s see how it can be used on the EA later.

Screenshot of the operation

!

Limit to open a position

1. Open a position from the current price grid: Open a position from the current price flat up or down.
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen\OpenBuyLimitOrder.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen\OpenSellLimitOrder.mq5

Application scenario: Place an order at a lower cost grid at the current price.
Scenario 1: At the beginning of an uptrend, the pullback opens long, I want a lower price, but it appears for a short time.
Scenario 2: Seize some unexpected opportunities, such as a large pullback in the rally.
Scenario 3: At the end of the market, guess the bottom and guess the top, maybe it is better to place an order on the grid.
Scenario 4: Quotes that often appear to reverse in battle.

2. Open a position at a specified price grid: Open a position flat up or down at the specified price.
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenBuyLimitOrder_4In2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenBuyLimitOrder_4Out2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenSellLimitOrder_4In2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenSellLimitOrder_4Out2.mq5

Scenario: Place an order at an estimated cost.
Scenario 1: This was originally done to consider the Limit+Stop combination. If you consider a callback when you are bullish, open a long order with Limit within -$4, and open a long order with Stop above +$2
Scenario 2: Limit should be used in volatile markets. If you use stop, you will lose money.
Scenario 3: Key position reversal.
Tiling range: Each tile, within the $2 price range. The range can be expanded multiple times.
(After many clicks, the test found that the price range has not changed, and it will be revised next time)

Long Position Function: Roll up or down from -$4 to open a long position. Click again to tile from -$6 or -$2.
Short position: Open a short position from +$4 upwards or downwards. Click again to tile from +$6 or +$2.
Position: The position of each operation is about 1%, please see the parameters of line 13, you can increase the recompilation.
Take Profit and Stop Loss: Now I don’t know if there is a good outside with Take Profit and Stop Loss.

Stop to open a position

3. Open a position from the current price grid: Open a position from the current price flat up or down.
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen\OpenBuyStopOrder.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen\OpenSellStopOrder.mq5

Application scenario: omitted.

4. Open a position at a specified price grid: Open a position flat up or down at the specified price.
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenBuyStopOrder_4In2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenBuyStopOrder_4Out2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenSellStopOrder_4In2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenSellStopOrder_4Out2.mq5

Application scenario: Try not to use small quotes, and try not to use low heat quotes.
Scenario 1: Major news market, orders can be opened within the last 30 seconds. But consider how big the range of fluctuations is.
Scenario 2: Retail investors concentrate their chips and quickly open reverse risk orders.
Scenario 3: The bearish reversal will be relatively large, and the volatility will be relatively large, and a risk order will be opened.
Scenario 4: Unilateral market, or trend, or the market that is manipulated by institutions to wash up and down, fluctuates greatly after the breakout.
Scenario 5: It is estimated that it will pull up and down, and only open orders other than plus or minus $4.
Tiling range: Each tile, within the $2 price range. The range can be expanded multiple times.
Long Position Function: Roll up or down from +$4 to open a long position. Click again to tile from +$6 or +$2.
Short position function: Open a short position from -$4 upwards or downwards. Click again to tile from -$6 or -$2.
Take Profit and Stop Loss: Stop loss must be brought. If there is a take profit position, it can be increased. Trying to take profit will cause slippage (in your favor).

(Delete the take profit, I don’t write a script later)

StopLimit to open a position

5. Open a position from the current price grid:

Application scenario: omitted. Because I don’t know what the features are for.

6. StopLimit to open a position: Not used.
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenBuyStopLimitOrder.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpen4\OpenSellStopLimitOrder.mq5

Application scenario: It is difficult to do without matching the moving average
Long single function: the price breaks through upwards and opens long at a low level.
Short order function: the price breaks down and opens short at a high level.
Take Profit and Stop Loss: It is better not to have a stop loss, because it is a long line. Or change to a stop loss and take profit of 10 may be better
entry.summary: I do a relatively small homeopathic list, and I will add it when I have experience.

entry.title: Two-way batch opening script
entry.content:
Relatively useful.

Two-way batch opening script

Introduction

open a limit order in both directions:

two-way stop order:

open a StopLimit order in both directions:

extension: the method of making a profit should be detailed. Think about how you can expand your functionality.
Extension 1: The position is tiled by a triangle.
Extension 2: Add auto-replenishment function. Non-stop manual supplementation may be equal to the effect of EA. Unilateral quotes do not be supplemented.

Open a limit order in both directions

1. Open a limit order in both directions:
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsLimitOrder.mq5

Application scenario: You can try the volatile market.
Scenario 1: Used when the market diverges.
Scenario 2: Reversal of the early stage.
Take Profit and Stop Loss: Stop Loss +2, Take Profit +3. (Automatically adjusts as needed)
Function Description:
Parameter 1: Start from 0.5 up and down, and open orders at an interval of 0.4.
Position Description: The total position will become larger when you click on it multiple times. Refer to another article on modifying positions.

2. Without Stop Loss or Take Profit:
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsLimitOrder_0_0.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsLimitOrder_0_10.mq5

Application scenario: chaotic market
Function description: The effect to be verified.

Open stop order in both directions

3. Two-way stop order:
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsStopOrder.mq5

Application scenario: Applicable to large unilateral markets.
Scenario 1: Place an order 10 seconds before the market starts
Take Profit & Stop Loss: Stop Loss +1.5, Take Profit +3. (Automatically adjust scripts as needed)
Function description: Batch billing within the range of 0 ~ 2 or 2 ~ 4 or 4 ~ 6.
Function 1: Click the first time, open orders from 0.4 + 0 ~ 2 in the upper and lower ranges, and open orders at intervals of 0.2. The denser the better.
Function 2: Click the second time, open an order from the upper and lower range of 0.4 + 2 ~ 4, and open an order at an interval of 0.2.
Function 3: Click the 3rd time, open orders from the upper and lower range of 0.4 + 4 ~ 6, and open orders at intervals of 0.2.
Function 4: Tap the 4th time, and so on.
Position Description: The total position will become larger when you click on it multiple times. Refer to another article on modifying positions.
Note 1: The risk of 2 points is high and you may lose money, and you will not be more if you are not sure.

[ operation video, refer to 2024-05-15 transaction records] (https://seefsi.github.io/2024/06/13/review_20240515)

[ all trading videos ➬] (https://seefs.github.io/2024/06/13/grow_insist_trade)

4. Without Stop Loss or Take Profit:
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsStopOrder_0_0.mq5
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsStopOrder_0_30.mq5

Application scenario: Applicable to large unilateral markets. More greedy than the one above.
Scenario 1: Place an order 10 seconds before the market starts
Take profit and stop loss: without stop loss, afraid of pulling up and down.
Function description: Batch billing within the range of 0 ~ 2 or 2 ~ 4 or 4 ~ 6.
Function 1: Click the first time, open orders from 0.4 + 0 ~ 2 in the upper and lower ranges, and open orders at intervals of 0.2. The denser the better.
Function 2: Click the second time, open an order from the upper and lower range of 0.4 + 2 ~ 4, and open an order at an interval of 0.2.
Function 3: Click the 3rd time, open orders from the upper and lower range of 0.4 + 4 ~ 6, and open orders at intervals of 0.2.
Function 4: Tap the 4th time, and so on.
Position Description: The total position will become larger when you click on it multiple times. Refer to another article on modifying positions.
Note 1: Manually modify the stop loss when you need to make a profit.

Open a StopLimit order in both directions

5. Open a StopLimit order in both directions:
Scripts\_OrderGridOpenP\OpenPairsStopLimitOrder.mq5

Application scenario: I haven’t used it. It may be used in a volatile upward or downward market.

entry.title: Set order parameters
entry.content:
Set Take Profit and Stop Loss.

Set order parameters

Introduction

reference script: downloaded from the code base on 2017.05.03
Due to functional requirements, it is inconvenient to use directly. The rest of the scripts are changed from the main one.

Unset:

initial setup: used a lot.
Name description: _10_0, indicating that the stop loss change is 10, decreasing by $1. The change in take profit is 0 and does not decrease.

set the alert:

set fine-tuning:

Stop loss halved: Use less.

one-sided trend setting:

pre-close settings: used more.

magic number settings:

Reference script

Modify_SL_TP：
Scripts\_OrderSetting\Modify_SL_TP.mq5

Function description: I don’t know how to enter parameters when using it, so the download is not provided. You can download it yourself from the forum.

Unset

1. Unset:
Scripts\_OrderSetting\ClearPairs_0_0.mq5

Application scenario: If the settings are incorrect, set them again. Or for debugging.

2. Set Big Take Profit: The function is not used. It feels like a random stop loss, and it doesn’t make much sense.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\ClearPairs_0_50.mq5

Application scenario: Quickly adjust the profit and take profit.
Function description: It can be clicked multiple times. Tap 1 +5.0, tap 2 +10.0, tap 3 +15.0.

Initial setup

3. Initial setting: control a single loss should not be too large.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\InitPairs_20_20.mq5
Scripts\_OrderSetting\InitPairs_30_60.mq5
Scripts\_OrderSetting\InitPairs_50_100.mq5

Application scenario: If the parameters have not been set, set the take-profit and stop-loss. (You can clear first)
Function description: fix a few of your own commonly used stop losses.
Function 1: Stop Loss -2, Take Profit +2. Set when entering the market for a short term.
Function 2: Stop Loss -3, Take Profit +6.
Function 3: Stop Loss -5, Take Profit +10. Take the list long.

4. Unified settings: Not used.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\InitPairs_By_First.mq5

Application scenario: Take profit and stop loss are chaotic, but you don’t want to clear and readjust. For example, fine-tuned.
Scenario 1: If you have added a position, change it to the same parameters.
Function description: Refer to the first order with parameters, synchronous settings.

Set up a rush

5. Double stop loss: used for many small orders, centralized parameter modification.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\UpdatePairs_20_0.mq5

Application scenario: Large unilateral market is available. If it is a large unilateral side, it will be profitable, and if it is pulled up and down, it will be lost.
Step 1: Open an order first, long and short in both directions. Note that opening 1 large order is faster than opening 10 small orders.
Step 2: Don’t be stopped. Cancel the setup before 8:29 (Clear script). 8:30 20 seconds before the start of the setup (Init script). If the fluctuation is too fast before 8:30, you need to click this script repeatedly (Update stop loss).
Step 3: At 8:30, wait for the profit and stability.
Step 4: Click this script again before the swing pullback, and the profit is only a lot more, because the script restricts the stop loss to the pullback.
Step 5: Without stop loss, select a suitable position to close the position manually.
Function description: Stop loss -2, take profit unchanged.
Function 1: Hold the stop loss $2 from the current price. You can keep ordering.
Function 2: Stop loss cannot be pulled back when making profits.

6. Single Take Profit: The function is of little use
Scripts\_OrderSetting\UpdatePairs_0_20.mq5

Application scenario: I don’t want to be stopped.
Function description: Stop loss unchanged, Take Profit +2.

Set fine-tuning

7. Advantageous direction: used for a lot of small orders, centralized parameter modification.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\MovePairs_2_0.mq5
Scripts\_OrderSetting\MovePairs_0_2.mq5
Scripts\_OrderSetting\MovePairs_0_10.mq5

Application scenario: Estimated Take Profit level.
Function description: Use Init or Update to modify the parameters first, and then use this to fine-tune.
Function 1: Stop loss is reduced by 0.2.
Function 2: Take profit increases by 0.2.
Function 3: Take Profit Increase by 1.0.

8. Downside: The file name is not obvious enough
Scripts\_OrderSetting\DecreasePairs_2_0.mq5
Scripts\_OrderSetting\DecreasePairs_0_2.mq5

Application scenario: Estimated Take Profit level.
Function description: Use Init or Update to modify the parameters first, and then use this to fine-tune.
Function 1: Stop loss increased by 0.2.
Function 2: Take profit decreases by 0.2.

Stop loss halved

9. Profit protection: I don’t do long-term, all this feature is useless.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\ProtectPairs_10_0.mq5

Application scenario: Protect profits when making profits.
Function description: Stop loss to the position of the open position, or half of the profit (can be multiple times).
Name description: _10_0, indicating that the stop loss change is 10, decreasing by $1. The change in take profit is 0 and does not decrease.
Other: Do not exceed the current price of the stop loss, it should prompt a failure, unprocessed.

Unilateral trend setup

10. Unilateral trend setting: do not write scripts, use the previous combination of functions.
Application scenario: How to configure parameters when the trend is halfway through.
Scenario 1: The market pauses and goes to eat. Set Take Profit +4 and Stop Loss -2. (10-2 stops with Init + Move)
Scenario 2: The market is weak to rebound. Set Take Profit +2 and Stop Loss -1. (Achieved with Init + Move stop loss 2–5 times)

Pre-Close Settings

11. Pre-closing settings: fixed parameters according to the actual application scenario.
The script is only available for XAUUSD, and the parameters for other symbols should be changed.

anti-reversal: A few scenes when you are ready to play, but you want to stay and watch.
Scripts\_OrderSetting\PreClosePairs_5_10.mq5

Application scenario: advantageous order, to the bottom, anti-breakthrough reversal.
Scenario 1: When the instantaneous reversal is 0.5, it will automatically appear.
Scenario 2: When reversing slowly, as long as the callback is limited, you can click a few more times to update the settings and prevent the order from being stopped.
Scenario 3: When slowly following the trend, tap a few more times. Keep the take profit at 1.0. A wave of market conditions brought it to the point of reversal.
Scenario 4: When the profit is estimated and the exit conditions are met, use this to expand the profit.

12. Trial and error:
Scripts\_OrderSetting\PreClosePairs_10_10.mq5

Application scenario: unoptimistic lists. You shouldn’t be in or it’s time to play.
Scenario 1: Place the wrong order, and admit it after losing a little.
Scenario 2: The order that is lucky to return to the original may be reversed quickly to prevent the loss from expanding.
Scenario 3: Just made a profit, not greedy.
Scenario 4: Take a risk to follow, and there must be a bottom limit for the drawdown.

13. Expand your profits:
Scripts\_OrderSetting\PreClosePairs_5_5.mq5

Application scenario: In some markets, a small fluctuation of 0.5 will be retraced, and no stop profit can be caught.
Scenario 1: The volatility is small in the morning, just take a profit of 0.5. Save yourself time.
Scenario 2: When there is a high probability of reversal, try to lose as little as possible. Take profit is swept away, which is usually a reversal signal.
Scenario 3: Expectations are small.

Magic number settings

partial liquidation: the function is too complicated, and it is troublesome to use, so I don’t consider it.
Application scenario: The magic number is different, and the point will not close all the positions. It is equivalent to reducing positions.

partial take profit: not considered. Do EA and then consider.
Application scenario: If the magic number is different, the point Update will not be updated to avoid all positions being closed.

entry.title: 常用统计
entry.content:
常用统计。

常用统计

介绍

常用统计：

下载代码库与验证效果

下载路径：

简单EA，基于简单均线与ADX：
Experts\_Demo\simple_ma-adx_ea_en.mq5
时间：2014.01.23

期望功能

自动解锁：我经历过不受控制的状态，导致大错。
上锁：研究怎么锁单，让脚本处理
N字解锁：多空多时平多，空多空时平空。
逐步解锁：赢利锁仓

赢利锁仓：
赢利锁仓：最高点反向锁仓。用最近的顶点。并计算支撑点主动解锁。解锁后又开锁仓单。更新旧单子止损在支撑点下。
赢利锁仓：整点快速盈利锁仓。
赢利换仓：多次触及解锁点，应该平仓旧单子。并下移开仓位置。
隔夜赢利锁仓：预测会向上挖坑。
无方向锁仓：在成本区上下成对锁仓。

entry.title: 本地脚本使用示例
entry.content:
从下载到使用。

本地脚本使用示例

介绍

使用示例：

下载

1. 下载最新脚本：参考下载与更新记录页面。

2. 移动并编译：

a. 打开编辑工具。

b. 打开任一一个脚本的目录。

c. 与下载包对比，并复制以下文件。

d. 编译以下脚本文件。有些文件不需要编译。

如果编译出错，请联系我。

e. 验证能否运行。可以用这3个脚本测试。

查看是否正常输出log。

f. 打开算法交易。

模拟开单

a. 调整仓位比例为50% ~ 100%。默认100%。

b. 预览批量开单的仓位与价格

查看仓位是否合适，价格间隔是否合理。

c. 模拟开单

d. 正式使用

正式使用

准备工作：
a. 切换到真实交易账号。
b. 使用更好的wifi信号。
c. 打开交易品种图表窗口。
可用LoadTemplate 脚本快速加载模板。
不过需要将脚本中的模板名称改为自己使用的模板名称。并移动模板到file位置。
d. 检查算法交易是否开启。切换账号默认会关闭算法交易。

准备交易：
a. 注意时间，设置电脑时间格式，显示秒数。
b. 集中精力，预估行情波动。它将影响交易结果。
c. 选择仓位比例、开单次数、是否带止损止赢。找到对应的脚本，准备点击。
d. 提前10秒用手机录像，并用电脑开单。时间自己控制。

做记录：
a. 记录行情波动，如何预测更准确。
b. 记录策略，如何选择最佳策略。

entry.title: 修改仓位与止赢止损
entry.content:
修改仓位与止赢止损。

修改仓位与止赢止损

介绍

修改修改参数：
仓位：
止赢止损：
批量开单范围和间隔：

修改参数

仓位说明：
兼容最小步：账户余额较少时，仓位使用最小值，步长减少并且均匀散开。
小重大轻：小账户仓位更重。

运行这个脚本，即可显示仓位大小说明。
Scripts\_OrderTest\OptimizeAccountLot.mq5

仓位修改：

如上图，修改 MM=0.06。即是每次批量下单总仓位为 6%。
然后重新编译。

止赢止损：
如上图，修改
STOPLOSS=150; // 止损150点，实测是$1.5
TAKEPROFIT=150; // 止赢300点

批量开单范围和间隔：
如上图，修改
RANGE=200; // 步长范围200点，在这个价格区间上下批量下单，
RTOTAL=20; // 步长40点，即10单

修改第一单价格偏移：
如上图，修改
LEVEL=40; // 与当前价格相差 $0.4, 开始开单。

重新编译

步骤：
a. 打开IDE，修改脚本参数
b. 右键 _Orderxx 文件夹，右键编译
c. 打开MT5软件，右键脚本刷新，需要时点击脚本运行

一套操作。

entry.title: 图表脚本
entry.content:
完成图表模板的加载。

图表脚本

介绍

图表脚本：

加载模板

模板路径：
模板可以放在默认位置或当前脚本位置。
Mql5
Mql5\Scripts\_Init
Mql5\Profiles\Templates\xauusd_m5.tpl
Terminal\Common\Files
Mql5\Files
Mql5\Tester\Files\

1. 加载模板：
Scripts\_Init\LoadTemplate.mq5

功能说明：调试模板的加载与存放位置，

打开新图表

2. 打开新图表：
Scripts\_Init\OpenNewChart.mq5

功能说明：关闭窗口，再重新打开窗口，并设置模板 Mql5\Files\xxx.tpl。
注释1：需要修改品种和模板名称。
